title: account_billing
name: account_billing
description: BETA An account billing serves as the glue between an account a document and their related account entries and line items. It also lets one keep track of who billed what and when. A billing is created from billable account entries, which are turned into line items for a document.

name.description: A note for the billing e.g. happyPDF usage April 2014. The field is wildcard searchable

account_id.description: The related account. Must be set for entries to be found.

group_entries_by.description: Group multiple account entries into single line items, when creating a billing+document from entries. Account entries MUST have the SAME price_single and quantity unit, to land in a group. Date base groups also require the SAME entry name.

document_type.description: The document type to create. CamelCase document class name. Invoice by default

set_billed_at.description: Set billed at date for related account entries.

document_id.description: The document created by the billing.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

team_id.description: A team uuid. Is inferred from the accounts team id.

filter[account_ids].title: Accounts
filter[account_ids].description: Find objects belonging to a single or a list of accounts, use ids comma separated.

filter[created_at_from].title: From creation date
filter[created_at_from].description: Objects with a date eq/after the date. YYYY-MM-DD

filter[created_at_to].title: To creation date
filter[created_at_to].description: Objects with a creation until the date(<=). ISO 8601 format YYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+z or just a date YYY-MM-DD. If date is given the time is set to the end of the day(23:59:59) so all objects created on that day are included. A time should be already utc time.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 50, max is 200

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
